post:
Hello lowendspirit community,

Today I come to you with brand new promotions for Quarterly purchases of our VPS servers. We are very happy to announce we have faster and better nodes at our disposal. This is why we are offering this promotions. We hope you have any use for them.

Promotion KVM Linux:
Price: 6.6$ /Quarterly 
Code: 40OFFAUGUST
RAM: 1 GB of RAM
Space: 10 GB NVMe
Speed: 1Gbps Unmetered (Will be manually applied, as it is also part of the promotion)
CPU: 1 vCPU @5Ghz 
IPv4 : 1
IPv6 : 4 /80 Subnets + 1 IPv6
Anti-DDoS Included
Link: https://hosterlabs.net/panel/cart.php?a=add&pid=113

Promo 2
Price: 14.4$ /Quarterly 
Code: 40OFFAUGUST
RAM: 2 GB of RAM ( +2 GB of RAM for the first 5-10 customers [Limited Stock] )
Space: 20 GB NVMe (+ 15GB NVMe first 5-10 customers [Limited Stock]  )
Speed: 1Gbps Unmetered (Will be manually applied, as it is also part of the promotion)
CPU: 2 vCPU @5Ghz 
IPv4 : 1
IPv6 : 4 /80 Subnets + 1 IPv6
Anti-DDoS Included
Link: https://hosterlabs.net/panel/cart.php?a=add&pid=114

Promo code applies to any KVM virtualized plan for quarterly purchases. Limited Stock.

Our looking glass Canada.lg.hosterlabs.net
Thanks for looking.house for helping us set this up.

We hope you enjoy the new promotions we have available.

Valid until 5 of September.

Node Specs: 

Intel Xeon-E 2288G ( 8 Cores / 16 threads ) Max Speed @5Ghz with overclocking.
128GB DDR4 ECC 2666MHz 
2 x 1TB NVMe in RAID 0 ( So if one drive fails, data is lost) Nevertheless, we keep remote backups of all servers.
10Gbps Downlink 2Gbps Uplink

All orders on this post will be provisioned in the newer 128GB of ram nodes.

Have a nice day,
Hosterlabs Team
